imdb.plot outline: Hosted and moderated by James B. Towle, ATSN's series "Stop the Threat" depicts reenactments of real crime scenes as they happened from across the country, providing a forum for expert guests (including firearms and weapon specialists, self-defense trainers, law enforcement and other professionals) to offer their expertise and advise on the situations as they occurred in a conversation that helps viewers and legally armed citizens to prepare should they be confronted with the unexpected.
imdb.title: ATSN: Stop the Threat
plot: Hosted and moderated by James B. Towle, ATSN's series "Stop the Threat" depicts reenactments of real crime scenes as they happened from across the country, providing a forum for expert guests (including firearms and weapon specialists, self-defense trainers, law enforcement and other professionals) to offer their expertise and advise on the situations as they occurred in a conversation that helps viewers and legally armed citizens to prepare should they be confronted with the unexpected.::ATSN
